statements: SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE supplier_id = 3
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_date, product_name FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%'
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM ProductionSchedule
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_date, product_name, quantity, supplier_id FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity, schedule_date FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY schedule_id ASC
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY product_name
SELECT schedule_date, supplier_id, product_name, quantity, schedule_id FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY supplier_id, schedule_id DESC
SELECT schedule_id, product_name, quantity FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 3, 5) ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM production_schedule;
SELECT production_id, product_name FROM production_schedule WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, deadline_date FROM production_schedule WHERE deadline_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM supplier WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, deadline_date FROM production_schedule JOIN supplier ON production_schedule.supplier_id = supplier.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE deadline_date > '2022-01-01' AND supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY deadline_date DESC

SELECT product_name, deadline_date FROM production_schedule JOIN supplier ON production_schedule.supplier_id = supplier.supplier_id WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers' AND deadline_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY deadline_date ASC
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, contact_person FROM production_schedule JOIN supplier ON production_schedule.supplier_id = supplier.supplier_id ORDER BY product_name ASC, supplier_name DESC

SELECT production_id, product_name, supplier_name, email_address FROM production_schedule JOIN supplier ON production_schedule.supplier_id = supplier.supplier_id WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3) ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE product_name LIKE '%Widget%' AND supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY deadline_date ASC
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM ProductionSchedule;
SELECT production_id, product_name, production_date FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM Supplier;
SELECT delivery_id, production_id, supplier_id, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM Delivery ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule;
SELECT product_name, quantity, production_date FROM ProductionSchedule ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM Supplier WHERE contact_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT delivery_id, production_id, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM Delivery WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, d.delivery_date, s.supplier_name FROM ProductionSchedule p JOIN Delivery d ON p.production_id = d.production_id JOIN Supplier s ON d.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Supplier ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT delivery_status FROM DeliveryStatus WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT line_name, team_lead, capacity FROM ProductionLine WHERE capacity > 10 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, delivery_date FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE delivery_date < '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT schedule_id, supplier_id, delivery_status, delivery_date FROM DeliveryStatus WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT item_name, quantity, delivery_date FROM ProductionSchedule ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT line_id, line_name, team_lead, capacity FROM ProductionLine WHERE capacity >= 50;
SELECT * FROM Production_Schedule;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM Production_Schedule ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM Supplier;
SELECT schedule_id, product_name, quantity FROM Production_Schedule WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_date, status FROM Supplier INNER JOIN Delivery_Status ON Supplier.supplier_id = Delivery_Status.schedule_id;
SELECT * FROM Production_Schedule ORDER BY production_date DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT schedule_id, product_name, quantity FROM Production_Schedule WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT delivery_id, schedule_id, count(status) AS status_count FROM Delivery_Status GROUP BY schedule_id
SELECT schedule_id, product_name, quantity FROM Production_Schedule WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
